body.p: This document provides information on getting support for numerics4j Most of these support features are hosted by SourceForge.

section.name: General Support
section.p: If you need to ask a question about using numerics4j, please enter a support request describing the problem you are confronted with. Be sure to browse existing requests as they might address similar issues.

section.name: Bugs
section.p: If you discover a bug while using numerics4j, feel free to enter a bug report detaling the error. Be sure to browse existing bug to insure you are not entering a duplicate.

subsection.name: Patches
subsection.p: Patches to existing bugs are graciously accepted. You are welcome to submit patches for any existing bug. This will greatly expidite bug resolutions.

section.name: Feature Requests
section.p: If there is an enhancement you would like added to the numerics4j, feel free to enter a feature request describing the new functionality. Be sure to browse existing requests to insure you are not entering a duplicate.

subsection.name: Patches
subsection.p: As with bugs, patches for existing enhancements are graciously accepted. You are welcome to submit patches for any enhancement.
